newsitem.title: USA: Spurlock Industries registers under SEC.
newsitem.headline: Spurlock Industries registers under SEC.

text.p: Spurlock Industries Inc said on Friday it has become fully registered with the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).

The company said the SEC has declared effective its Form 8-A Registration Statement relating to the registration under Section 12(g) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the "Exchange Act"), of the company's common stock, no par value.
"This will reduce the restrictions brokers face when trading our stock," said H. Norman Spurlock, Jr., company vice president.
